welcome_message_body: Welcome to Myrtle Beach, where the sun, sand, and Southern charm await you. Explore our beautiful coastline, vibrant boardwalk, and renowned golf courses, and soak in all the fun and relaxation our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Mellow Mushroom
restaurants.description: Mellow Mushroom is a pizzeria located in Myrtle Beach.

restaurants.name: Joe's Crab Shack
restaurants.description: Joe's Crab Shack is a seafood restaurant located in Myrtle Beach.

restaurants.name: Yamato
restaurants.description: Yamato is a japanese restaurant located in Myrtle Beach.
restaurants.address: 1213 Celebrity Cir (Broadway At The Beach), Myrtle Beach, SC 29577

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Myrtle Beach.
restaurants.address: 1940 Mister Joe White Ave, Myrtle Beach, SC 29577

restaurants.name: Wahlburgers
restaurants.description: Wahlburgers is a burger joint located in Myrtle Beach.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Myrtle Beach AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Myrtle Beach AFB Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Strand Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Strand Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
